comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
There is now a Continuum server running at http://jackrabbit.zones.apache.org/continuum/

It automatically build and tests all the release components within an hour of the last commit. Possible error notifications are sent to dev@.

Successful builds are deployed nightly to the Maven 2 snapshot repository at http://people.apache.org/repo/m2-snapshot-repository/

description: Once the Jackrabbit zone is created (see INFRA-1008), setup nightly Jackrabbit builds as discussed in http://thread.gmane.org/gmane.comp.apache.jackrabbit.devel/9190/.
